---
format: html
css: styles.css

listing: 
  - id: featurepanels
    type: grid
    sort: dispord
    contents: 
      - "featurepanels/*.qmd"
    page-size: 3
    
  - id: casestudypanels
    type: grid
    sort: dispord
    # Set max-items to 1 to display only one item per page
    contents: 
      - "casestudypanels/*.qmd"
    fields: ["title", "image", "listing-description"] 
    field-display-names: # Optional: customize the display name in the listing
      listing-description: "\n" # Display nothing instead of "short-description"
    page-size: 1
    grid-columns: 1
    image-height: 300px
    max-description-length: 1000


  - id: newsitems
    type: grid
    sort: date desc
    image-height: 0px
    contents: 
    - "news/*.qmd"
    page-size: 3
#    filter-ui: true
---
